channel.title: Comments on: Getting Nerdy With The Histogram

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description: and for the real lamen out there, the word is "laymen"
item.content:encoded: and for the real lamen out there, the word is “laymen”

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description:
Ah this is kinda neat. I wonder if people will start up a new form of photo-shopped art heh I guess this isn't too far off from fractals in the technical sense.
Artistic means aside, you think they could come up with an ISO standard for LCDs/Monitors so the histogram wouldn't be so needed... Damn Canon LCDs on the cameras lie so bad!
item.content:encoded:
Ah this is kinda neat. I wonder if people will start up a new form of photo-shopped art heh I guess this isn’t too far off from fractals in the technical sense.

Artistic means aside, you think they could come up with an ISO standard for LCDs/Monitors so the histogram wouldn’t be so needed… Damn Canon LCDs on the cameras lie so bad!
